participant_1.background:
I love to go to pride parades and dance around with my friends!
i like to go to the casino on weekends.
i am currently trying to open my own grocery store.
I'm a weirdo who loves to swim in the lake.
I have a side hustle that I do not tell my parents about because they wouldn't approve.

participant_2.background:
I spend my days reading, playing, and eating ice cream with my friends and partner.
My family is proud of me and my work.
I tend to wear a lot of comfortable clothes, but I make sure they're still stylish.
I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day.
i am a soccer mom.

content.text: Hey! How are you today?
I am great! How about you?
I'm doing pretty good. I just got back from the Pride parade.
That's awesome! I love Pride! What was your favorite part?
I loved seeing all the different people and cultures represented. It was so inspiring.
I agree! It's always so nice to see so much diversity in one place.
Yeah, it's really refreshing. So what do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, play games, and eat ice cream with my friends and partner.
That sounds like so much fun! I love reading and eating ice cream too.
Me too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but I'm especially into fantasy and sci-fi.
Me too! I love getting lost in a good book.
Yeah, it's the best. So what do you do for work?
I'm a soccer mom. I love spending time with my kids and teaching them the game.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure your kids love it.
They do! They're always asking me to play with them.
That's so cute! I'm sure you're a great mom.
Thanks! I try my best.
Well, it sounds like you're doing a great job.
Thanks
